detail_desc: Short shirt dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Short, tie-hem shirt in a lightweight viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Sandals in cotton canvas with an adjustable hook and loop tab over the foot. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with long sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front with a twisted detail at the hem.

prod_name: DIV+ Kim HW satin pull on trs
detail_desc: Ankle-length trousers in satin crêpe with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and elasticated hems.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with a low-cut neckline front and back and wide shoulder straps. No fasteners.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a lined gusset, string back and low, V-shaped waist with a wide lace trim.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in jersey crêpe with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck, and a sewn-in wrapover with draping and a knot detail at the waist. Unlined.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with lacing and elastication at the waist. Fake fly with a button, front and back pockets and tapered legs.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Medium coverage at the back.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined triangle bikini top with wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with a lace section over the shoulders and a wide neckline with gathers front and back.
Blouse in an airy modal weave with a V-neck with decorative gathers, concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with smocked cuffs.
Metal bracelets in various designs, two decorated with plastic beads. Adjustable length.
Underwired lace bras with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Socks in a soft fine-knit with elasticated tops.
Metal rings in various designs. Four decorated with sparkly plastic beads.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with pointed toes, a visible zip in one side and covered heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood and zip down the front. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short-sleeved jumpsuit in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons at the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, a seam at the waist with ties, and straight, ankle-length legs.
Nightdresses in soft, printed cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves and a small bow at the neckline.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with pointed toes and elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 8 cm.
Straight-cut dress in woven fabric containing glittery threads with an opening and button at the back of the neck, heavily padded shoulders and long sleeves.

Straight-style cardigan in a fine-knit viscose blend with a sheen. Low dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and crocheted lace trims at the cuffs and hem. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.

Cargo trousers in stretch twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a zip fly and button, side pockets, fake flap back pockets and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud. Slim legs with decorative stitching at the knees.
Waist belt in imitation leather with a decorative knot detail at the front and elastic with a metal fastener at the back. Width approx. 4 cm.
Sports tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Sweatshirt made from a sturdy wool and cotton blend in a relaxed fit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a round neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Vest top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
V-neck bustier in woven fabric with narrow, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps, a front fastening and inset, hole-embroidered trims at the hem. Lined.
Leather boots with a straight shaft and twill linings and insoles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Set with a T-shirt and shorts in soft, printed fabric. Jersey T-shirt with raw, roll edges around the neckline and sleeves and a chest pocket with a button. Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, side pockets and contrasting colour mesh panels down the sides of the legs. Reflective details.

Padded all-in-one suit in a lightly brushed, patterned weave. Pile-lined hood with a faux fur pompom on top, two concealed zips down the front with a chin guard and elastication at the back of the waist. Foldover mitts at the cuffs and foldover feet at the hems to keep the hands and feet warm. Fleece lining.
Blouse in an airy cotton and linen weave with embroidery on the front, short sleeves and slits in the sides of the hem.
Ankle boots with pointed toes and elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 5 cm.

Calf-length dress in a crinkled, textured cotton weave with a V-neck and long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Drawstring waist and a flared skirt with inset lace trims. Lined with a short dress in a cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
Straight-cut blouse in an airy patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Knee-length dress in patterned silk satin with a small stand-up collar and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Pleats around the neckline, long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood with reflective details and a stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Satin dance shoes with crossover elastic straps over the foot. Cotton linings and insoles and soft suede soles.
Lace cardigan with 3/4-length dolman sleeves, a rounded hem and no buttons.
Mules with open toes, leather linings and insoles, and covered heels approx. 2.5 cm.
Straight-cut jacket in soft jersey with long notch lapels, welt front pockets and sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No buttons.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Imitation leather hi-tops with a padded top edge, adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short dungaree dress in stretch cotton corduroy with straps that fasten with buttons at the front, an open, frill-trimmed chest pocket and buttons at the sides.
Imitation leather belt with a patterned imitation suede front and a metal buckle. Width 2 cm.
Chino shorts in a washed cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.
Dungarees in washed, stretch denim with a fake fly, press-studs at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners.

Blouse in woven fabric with buttons down the front and a grandad collar with narrow ties. Double-layered yoke with a seam and pleat at the back, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with print stripes on the sleeves, a yoke, dropped shoulders and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Skater skirt in cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Jumper in a fine, fluffy knit with an intarsia motif on the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a linen and cotton blend with pearly buttons at the top and short slits in the sides.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Chunky-sole trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with buttons on one shoulder and a chest pocket.

Long dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with flounces around the armholes, short, narrow shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a wide skirt with gathers at the top. Lined.
Bohemian blouse in a soft cotton weave with elastication and a broderie anglaise flounce at the top.

Shirt in an airy viscose weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Jersey vest top with a print motif.
